clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Rifampin on the Pharmacokinetics of Ataluren
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Study Assessing the Effects of Rifampin on the Pharmacokinetics of Ataluren in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This will be a single centre, Phase I, open-label, one cohort, one dose level, fixed-sequence, drug interaction study in healthy volunteers. The objective of this study is to determine the effects of rifampin on the pharmacokinetics of ataluren under fasting conditions.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)
primary_outcome.description: The objective of this study is to determine the effects of rifampin on the pharmacokinetics of ataluren under fasting conditions.
The objective of this study is to determine the effects of rifampin on the pharmacokinetics of ataluren under fasting conditions.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety as measured by adverse events, laboratory abnormalities, vital signs, and electrocardiogram parameters

arm_group.description: Ataluren 1375 mg powder for oral suspension administered once daily on Days 1 and 11 Rifampin 300 mg capsules administered twice daily on Day 3 to Day 12

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy
- Male
- Non-smoker
- ≥18 and ≤55 years of age
Exclusion Criteria:
- Clinically significant laboratory, electrocardiogram, or vital sign abnormality at screening
- Positive urine drug screen at screening
- History of significant drug or alcohol abuse
- Recent use of medication other than topical products without significant systemic absorption
- Recent donation of plasma or blood or loss of blood
